sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO POSITION (POSITION_ID , POSITION_NAME, POSITION_STATUS) VALUES (#positionId#, #positionName#, #positionStatus#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE POSITION SET POSITION_NAME=#positionName#, POSITION_STATUS=#positionStatus# WHERE DIVISION_ID=#positionId#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE POSITION SET POSITION_STATUS=0 WHERE POSITION_ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT POSITION_ID AS positionId, POSITION_NAME AS positionName, POSITION_STATUS AS positionStatus FROM POSITION WHERE POSITION_ID=#id#
